alert.note: Alert for Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pinellas County through 430 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm approaching Bay Pines, and Seminole, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Largo, Pinellas Park, Seminole, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Saint Petersburg, St. Petersburg, St. Pete Beach, Bay Pines, South Highpoint, Gandy, Feather Sound, West And East Lealman, Ridgecrest, Tierra Verde, Gulfport, Treasure Island, Kenneth City, South Pasadena, Madeira Beach and Redington Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
